title: NOTIFICATIONS
message:
We are aware of an issue where notifications stop working each day. We are working to fix this.

For now, please turn the notification bell off and on again each to recieve notifications for that day.

title: Al Quds Mosque
message:
Prayer starts immediately after Isha

The masjid will pray 8 rakats followed by 3 rakats

title: Al Medinah Mosque
message:
1st - Immediately after Isha | 2nd - 9:30pm

The masjid will pray 10 rakats followed by 3 rakats
